import React from 'react'; import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; class Navbar extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.onClick=this.onClick.bind(this) } onClick(e){ localStorage.removeItem('userToken') localStorage.removeItem('userName') window.location.reload("/") } render(){ return (
    {localStorage.getItem("userToken") != null ? <>
  • Home
  • Create
  • {localStorage.getItem("userName")}
    My Profile My Blog Logout
    • : <>
  • Login
  • Signup
    • }
); } } export default Navbar;
